channel.title: Getting weird error
channel.description:
when i do admin commands like::infinity and others
heres what happens if i press::infinity sudenly the game freezes and then i ceck my client dos window and i get an error:
RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6916 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:214) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:270) at client.method105(client.java:8034) at client.method36(client.java:1598) at client.method102(client.java:7757) at client.method9(client.java:8610) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4445) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
if some1 can plz help me out whit this this also happends to some shops

item.title: Getting weird error
item.dc:creator: @kev3136 kev3136
item.description:
@kev3136 wrote:

WEll there is an error in the item that you were trying to upload… honestly all you can really do is delete your game character … and start over

Read full topic
